price: 17. Sima bakoloba na bango wana maye bozalaki koboya kondima.
arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
